choose.when: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM (SELECT num, price, title, issaled, category,viewcount,imagepath,explain FROM goods ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM (SELECT num, price, title, issaled, category,viewcount,imagepath, FROM goods where title like '%'||#{search}||'%' or explain like '%'||#{search}||'%' ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM (SELECT num, price, title, issaled, category,viewcount,imagepath, FROM goods where category=#{category} ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
choose.otherwise: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM (SELECT num, price, title, issaled, category,viewcount,imagepath,explain FROM goods where (title like '%'||#{search}||'%' or explain like '%'||#{search}||'%') and category=#{category} ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
